    • getAthleteSummary

      public String getAthleteSummary()
      get Athletes' summarized specification. This returns athlete's name, offensive Stat, defensive stat, stamina, total stamina and String 'Yes' if athlete is injured. 'no' otherwise.
      Returns:
      String value about summarized specification about athletes.

    • isInjured

      public boolean isInjured()
      check if an athlete is injured, athletes' injured variable becomes true if athletes' stamina is lower than or equal to zero
      Returns:
      athletes' injured status
